backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no defined methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to related files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries of all frontend source files.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML shell that mounts the React app and loads main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with home and search routes and renders the router.
frontend/src/components/ResultsList.tsx: Displays search results or empty states with title, host, and snippet formatting.
frontend/src/components/SearchForm.tsx: Search form with input, clear button, optional action buttons, and compact mode support.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, with query invalidation on identity change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context with login, logout, and identity persistence logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file for future backendâ€‘related React Query hooks.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base/styles plus OKLCH theme variables for light and dark UI modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React entry point initializing QueryClient, Internet Identity provider, and rendering App.
frontend/src/mock/searchDataset.ts: Defines the SearchResult interface and exports a mock array of search result objects used for client-side filtering.
frontend/src/pages/SearchHomePage.tsx: Implements the search homepage UI with a logo, search form, and navigation handlers for standard and lucky searches.
frontend/src/pages/SearchResultsPage.tsx: Renders the search results page, reads the query from the URL, filters the mock dataset, and displays results with a header search bar.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS with custom colors, fonts, container settings, animations, and plugin integrations.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata including features, requirements, generated assets, and the current build state.
